oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Center Hill Motel and Restaurant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial view of the Center Hill Motel and Restaurant overlooking Center Hill Lake. Shows Highway 26 to the right of motel and bridge in background.
The Center Hill Motel and Restaurant is located on Highway 26 between Smithville and Sparta, Tennessee. The Motel and Restaurant was built in 1954.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Neal, Paul
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Motels; Restaurants; Lakes and ponds; Roads; Bridges
